{"id":896750411,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1676231735,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/896750411/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check Distances Between Same Letters","memory":"13 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int find_pos(string& s, char c) {\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) if(s[i] == c) return i;\n        return -1;\n    }\n    bool checkDistances(string s, vector<int>& distance) {\n        char curr_letter = 'a';\n        int dist = 0;\n        int pos = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < distance.size() && curr_letter <= 'z'; i++) {\n            pos = find_pos(s, curr_letter);\n            if (pos != -1) {\n                dist = 0;\n                while (s[pos+1] != curr_letter) {\n                    pos++;\n                    dist++;\n                }\n                if (dist != distance[i]) return false;\n            }\n            curr_letter++;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-distances-between-same-letters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
